verbs.description: President Trump [V: has] vowed not to repeat the errors of his predecessors , but his apparent softening on North Korea resembles approaches taken by Bill Clinton and George W. Bush .
[ARG0: President Trump] has [V: vowed] [ARG1: not to repeat the errors of his predecessors] , but his apparent softening on North Korea resembles approaches taken by Bill Clinton and George W. Bush .

[ARG0: President Trump] has vowed [ARGM-NEG: not] to [V: repeat] [ARG1: the errors of his predecessors] , but his apparent softening on North Korea resembles approaches taken by Bill Clinton and George W. Bush .
President Trump has vowed not to repeat the errors of his predecessors , but [ARG1: his apparent softening on North Korea] [V: resembles] [ARG2: approaches taken by Bill Clinton and George W. Bush] .
President Trump has vowed not to repeat the errors of his predecessors , but his apparent softening on North Korea resembles [ARG1: approaches] [V: taken] [ARG0: by Bill Clinton and George W. Bush] .
